p: pH was determined for the homogeneous mixtures of meat with distilled water using a proportion of 1:10, w/ v [ 16]. A 5 g portion of the sample was homogenized in 50 ml of distilled water (pH 7.00) and the mixture was filtered. The pH of the filtrate was measured using pH-meter (pH 210 Microprocessor pH Meter, HANNA instruments, Germany) at each sampling point.
